pathAssistantSteps.info:
Learn about and contact your new lead quickly.

Use Salesforce leads to record and follow up on customers' potential interest in our bank's products and services.


Respond to your lead within five minutes to increase your chances of being able to successfully meet the customer's need.

  • Look at the customer profile to prepare yourself before contacting them.
  • Understand what we already know about their goals, life stage, financial situation.
  • Check their recent activity to see if they have been engaging with us.

Keep in touch with the customer


Now that you know that the customer is interested in one of our products and you have confirmed the product is suitable, follow up regularly to ensure progress.

  • Contact the customer regularly to check if they have any questions
  • Ensure the customer is enrolled for automatic lead-nurturing email campaigns

Verify contact information and qualify your lead.


Gather as much contact information as you can. Get tips from the pros about the importance of qualifying your lead.

  • Get your lead’s email address, phone number, and title so that you can include your lead in future campaigns.
  • Email your lead first, and immediately follow up with a phone call.
  • Rehearse your call scripts so that you sound confident and the flow of your conversation is more natural.
